author: Mehera Bonner
title: Kylie Jenner Reveals New Line of Highlighters - Check Out Kylie Jenner's Highlighter Line
text:
Your Prayers Have Been Answered: Kylie Jenner Is Coming Out with a Highlighter 
And it comes in *six* shades. Most Popular By Mehera Bonner Feb 23, 2017 Today is *truly* a great day (WHAT A TIME TO BE ALIVE!) because not only did we discover that Kanye West is coming out with a makeup line , Kylie Jenner's new highlighters are coming to a cheekbone near you. The beauty entrepreneur announced her newest endeavor via Instagram, giving fans a look at a whopping six shades of highlighter. And when we say "highlighter," we obviously mean "kylighter." A post shared by Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:29am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The new additions are named Chocolate Cherry, Strawberry Shortcake, Cotton Candy Cream, Salted Caramel, French Vanilla, and Banana Splitâ€”causing us to be extremely hungry for both the product, and also food. A post shared by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:15pm PST Most Popular Kylie says her favorite of the bunch is Cotton Candy Cream, which is this guy right here: A post shared by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:02pm PST Check out a full range of swatches below, and whip out your credit card on February 28 at 3 p.m. PST to buy your very own Kylighter. A post shared by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 22, 2017 at 9:15pm PST Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more.
